section.title: activity
section.para: activity command interacts with org.mobincets.slee:name=ActivityManagementMBean Bean. It is non standard SLEE MBean. Please refer to its documentation for details. activity allows to access information about activities and perform management operations. It supports following operations:

section.title: count
section.para:
count operation simply returns current count of activities. It does not support argument nor options. Example call:
List all deployed SBBs
twiddle.sh activity -c

section.title: query
section.para: query operation is capable of two things. First is to manage time between activity liveliness query(Refer to &THIS.PLATFORM; JSLEE Guide for description of liveliness query). Second is triggering liveliness query. It does not support argument. Optionally it may be followed by one of following options:

listitem.para: specifies number of seconds between liveliness query. Requires number as argument.

example.title: Set time between query to 60 seconds

listitem.para: Retrieves number of seconds between liveliness queries.

section.title: idle
section.para: idle operation allows to manage maximum idle time for activity before it is eligible for garbage collection. It does not support argument. It supports following options:

listitem.para: specifies number of seconds which indicates time allowed for activity to be not accessed. If this values is exceeded, next liveliness query will try to free resource.
fetches number of seconds indicating how long activity may be not accessed before liveliness query will reclaim it.

section.title: list
section.para: list operation lists certain information based on passed options. It does not support argument. It requires one option to be present. Following options are supported:

listitem.para: instructs operation to list activity contexts factories registered in container. Does not support argument. Example call:

instructs operation to list activity contexts and data associated with them. It optionally may take boolean argument. If argument is present and set to true operation will list details in text form, otherwise only statistic is printed for activity context.
instructs operation to list ID of activity contexts based on activity type. Requires FQN of activity class as argument.
instructs operation to list ID of activity contexts based on Resource Adaptor Entity name. Requires entity name as argument.
instructs operation to list ID of activity contexts based on SbbID. Requires SbbID as argument.
